content.en: Streaming optimization: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the efficiency and performance of online media streaming. They have found that algorithms can play a crucial role in offloading server and network resources, optimizing tree reliability and service delay, constructing high-bandwidth overlay trees, minimizing server bandwidth costs, improving transmission efficiency, achieving collaborative streaming under bandwidth constraints, optimizing data throughput, and more. These algorithms use techniques such as resource diversity, peer-to-peer sharing, scalable video coding, gossip-based partnership formation, and adaptive topology formation to enhance the streaming experience for users.
content.da: Streamingoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt måder at forbedre effektiviteten og ydeevnen af online mediestreaming. De har fundet ud af, at algoritmer kan spille en afgørende rolle i at aflaste server- og netværksressourcer, optimere trækpålidelighed og servicetid, konstruere høj-båndbredde overlaytræer, minimere serverens båndbreddeomkostninger, forbedre transmissionseffektiviteten, opnå samarbejdsstreaming under båndbreddebegrænsninger, optimere datagennemløb og meget mere. Disse algoritmer bruger teknikker som ressourceforskellighed, peer-to-peer deling, skalerbar videokodning, rygtebaseret partnerskabsdannelse og adaptiv topologidannelse for at forbedre brugerens streamingoplevelse.
